title: AIRE Sans Serif Gym Type
content:
Hi I am working on a rebranding assignment and this is the current logo. I am trying to figure out which typeface or typefaces are being used for AIRE. I am wondering if it is different ones for each letter or a cheap knock-off, but any help is greatly appreciated.

Thanks again!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-02-14 at 12.05.25 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819110201/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-02-14%20at%2012.05.25%20PM.png) | 18.29 KB |
author: baconpress

comments.content: "URBAN FITNESS": could be wrong but it might be [Akzidenz Grotesk Extended Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819110201/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be/)
Awesome, that is it. Thank you so much!
